-1.title: The Reno On the Lake
-1.plot: Andrew and Robin are searching for their dream home in Maine. They want something big enough for their four growing children and right on a lake, and it's all hands on deck as they tackle a massive renovation.

1.title: Spanish Fixer to Spanish Dream
1.plot: A couple buys a million dollar house then renovates to create their dream.

2.title: First Time for Everything
2.plot: First-time homeowners and parents take on a renovation.

3.title: Charming Contemporary Kitchen
3.plot: Buying an older home leads to a major kitchen makeover.

4.title: Woodwork Does Wonders
4.plot: A woodworking pro and her husband go for Cape Cod style.

5.title: Modern Mexican Backyard
5.plot: A growing family outgrows their apartment & looks for a home with a yard.

6.title: Modern Masculine Kitchen
6.plot: A young couple buys a house, and creates a modern, masculine dream kitchen.

7.title: Vintage Spanish Master Bath
7.plot: A home search leads to a bathroom and closet renovation.

8.title: Quirky and Modern Bedroom
8.plot: A quirky lady and her minimalist fiancÃ© clash on home style and renovation.

9.title: Living Room Turned Bedroom
9.plot: New owners turn their living room into a master bedroom.

10.title: New Coast, New Kitchen
10.plot: A television star and his girlfriend look for a house in L.A.

11.title: Multifunctional Garage
11.plot: A couple seeks a house for a music studio and guest space.

12.title: A Space to Entertain
12.plot: A couple wants their new home to allow them to entertain.

13.title: Modern Craftsman Kitchen
13.plot: Partners want to create an open, modern craftsman kitchen.

1.title: Big Dreams, Little Kitchen
1.plot: A couple with big ideas tries to renovate a little kitchen.

2.title: Modernizing a Master Suite
2.plot: A family modernizes an outdated master suite.

3.title: A Whole New Floor Plan
3.plot: A contractor and his wife give a tired house a whole new floor plan.

4.title: Modern vs. Beachy Kitchen
4.plot: A couple overhauls their kitchen, but he wants modern and she wants beachy.

5.title: The Unlivable Living Room
5.plot: A young couple transforms an unlivable living room

6.title: A Small Kitchen Goes Big
6.plot: A family blows out the walls of a small kitchen for a big renovation.

7.title: Wrecked Rec Room
7.plot: A couple buys a fixer and turns a wrecked rec room into a hip game lounge.

8.title: Suburban Kitchen Fixer
8.plot: A couple gets a suburban fixer and upgrades the kitchen.

9.title: Teppanyaki Teardown
9.plot: A couple buys their first fixer, and they give the kitchen a makeover.

10.title: Modern Master Bedroom Redo
10.plot: A young couple gives their master bedroom a modern redo.

11.title: Massive Master Bath Redo
11.plot: A couple looks for a home they can put their own stamp on.

12.title: Buying a House for a Fridge
12.plot: A couple searches for a place that blends their two styles.

13.title: Renovating a Surfer's Retreat
13.plot: A surfer's family turns a shabby beach house into a cozy retreat.

6.title: It's All About Spanish
6.plot: A First-Time Buyer Has Her Heart Set on A Spanish Fixer. Meghan has been living with her twin sister Lauren while she begins the process of looking for her own place to buy. Eager to find the perfect starter home, Megan is looking in the Leimert Park neighborhood of L.A., where she grew up. In addition to wanting to live close to her family, she's only interested in seeing Spanish style homes. This proves to be a challenge in her budget and desired area- will Meghan be willing to compromise on style and location in order to get a foothold in L.A's competitive real ...

3.title: An Old House Gets a New Master Plan
3.plot: Ben and Katie are expecting their second child and are ready to upgrade from their Cambridge, MA, condo to a house with more space. Things get worse once they get the keys as their older home creates a lot of new problems.

6.title: Realtor Turns Contractor on His Own Fixer-Upper
6.plot: Ani and Allen have been living at home to save up to buy a place of their own. They both want a traditional style place, but Allen wants some modern touches. They are not very handy but want to find a house to make their own.

9.title: First Time Homebuyers Take on an Over the Top Renovation
9.plot: Rachael and Ryan are ready to start a family, so they need to get out of their cramped 900 square foot rental. To lower costs, Ryan's willing to tackle a true fixer-upper and handle renovations himself, but still blows the budget.

7.title: A Los Angeles Couple Goes Rogue on Designer's Renovation Plans
7.plot: A couple moves to the San Fernando Valley area of Los Angeles and immediately begin a remodel on their kitchen with assistance from a designer, who works to update the space to match her clients' tastes and cooking needs.

1.title: Two Lawyers Argue the Case of Spanish vs. Traditional Vintage
1.plot: Two married lawyers defend their conflicting Spanish versus traditional vintage styles.

2.title: A Growing L.A. Family Moves to the Chicago Suburbs
2.plot: Jessica and Roddy need a new home for their growing family, so they've decided to move from the expensive Los Angeles real estate market to the more affordable Chicago suburbs.

3.title: A Chicago Couple Struggles Through a Stressful Renovation of Their First Home in the Suburbs
3.plot: Chicago couple Tommy and Amanda are ready to buy their first house together. He wants a raised ranch, while she wants a two-story Georgian home. Can they find a place they both appreciate and make it their own?

5.title: Newlyweds Struggle to Combine a Contemporary Look with Traditional Character
5.plot: Newlyweds struggle to find a place with a contemporary look for him and traditional charm for her.

6.title: A Growing Family Tackles a Massive Reno in Chicago
6.plot: A family tackling a huge renovation of their new Chicago home tries to keep things on budget.

8.title: An Architect and a Preservationist Search for a Historic Home They Can Make Hip Again
8.plot: High school sweethearts Tyler and Kelley live in Burbank, CA and are ready to upgrade from apartment living. After searching and deliberating on which house to buy, they finally get the keys. But improvements reveal hidden damage.

11.title: A Newlywed Buffalo Couple Tackles Their First Renovation
11.plot: A newlywed couple is ready to set down roots and buy their first home in Buffalo. They'll have to take on major renovations to transform their new house into the home they want.

12.title: Riding the Renovation Wave
12.plot: A couple rides the renovation wave in Southern California.

1.title: Country vs. City in Austin
1.plot: An Austin family is searching for a large home they can buy and renovate in time for their annual holiday party. He's a city boy and she's a counatry girl, so they'll need lots of land, space to entertain and a lot of compromise.

2.title: California Couple Tries to Blend His Midcentury Vibe with Her Contemporary Style
2.plot: Dave and Jessica are searching for a single-family home in Burbank, California. Dave is looking for a bit of retro midcentury flair, but Jessica prefers something with a more contemporary style.

4.title: A Young Family Searches for A Home With Enough Space for 6'7" Dad
4.plot: A young family with a dad who is 6'7" searches for a home in Culver City, CA, where they can all feel comfortable.

4.title: When Reno Hurts so Good
4.plot: A comedian and his wife look for the humor in the major renovation of their midcentury California home.

5.title: Fixin' To Reno
5.plot: Texas transplants tackle renovations in their new California home but discover issues only family can fix.

11.title: Doubling Down on Renovation
11.plot: A California couple is looking to leave their small condo for a single-family fixer-upper in pricey Redondo Beach.

1.title: Reno Budget Down the Drain
1.plot: After relocating to Southern California, a family wants to buy a home in Thousand Oaks that has a large backyard and an updated master bedroom.

2.title: Engineering a Renovation in Austin, Texas
2.plot: Computer engineers want to buy their first home together in Austin, Texas, but they disagree on what they want.

3.title: Picture-Perfect Kitchen Reno
3.plot: A California couple set out to create a good blogger's dream kitchen, with more counter space and natural light for photographs. (Home and Garden).

4.title: Three Agents, One Renovation
4.plot: A couple gets pushed out of their comfort zone during a full-house renovation in Burbank, California.

5.title: Our First Family Fixer
5.plot: Tired of living in apartments and with two little boys in tow, Lucho and Annie are ready to buy their first real home for their family.

6.title: Newlyweds Run Their Own Reno
6.plot: A newlywed real-estate agent and a general contractor tackle their first reno together instead of taking a honeymoon.

8.title: Getting a House and Wallet
8.plot: A Los Angeles couple search for a spacious smiley home with three bedrooms, a big kitchen and backyard. Once hey find the right place, major renovations begin that come with unexpected issues and costs. (Home and Garden).

9.title: Gutting a House and Wallet
9.plot: Now that they have a young son, Lars and Katherine would like to trade their cramped Los Angeles rental for a spacious three-bedroom house. Once they find the right home, rising costs cause them to rethink their renovation plans.

10.title: Makeovers, Money and Music
10.plot: California homeowners have to face the music when their remodel doesn't go as planned. He wants a music studio, and she wants an open kitchen for entertaining. Can they handle the massive renovation and get everything they want?

1.title: Redoing a Budget-Eating Fixer
1.plot: A couple looks for a contemporary but rustic home where they can raise their daughter. After finding a property and beginning renovations, they make an unsettling discovery that costs almost a third of their budget to fix.

4.title: Austin Rain and Renovation
4.plot: A California couple faces reno nightmares working on their beach home.

7.title: Military Family Reno Battle
7.plot: A military family battles home renovations after relocating to Austin, TX.

8.title: Saying I Do During Renovation
8.plot: A couple plans their wedding while renovating their dream beach home.

9.title: Renovation in the News
9.plot: A couple races the clock renovating their new Silver Lake, CA, home.

10.title: Surf, Sand and Reno
10.plot: A long-time renter struggles through budget issues and problematic renovations with hopes of having her own beach-chic home for her and her pets in Manhattan Beach, CA.

11.title: Vintage Reno, Vintage Problems
11.plot: A couple looks for their first home in Glendale, CA. After they find a house, they roll up their sleeves and start the renovation, but their vintage home turns out to have lots of vintage problems hidden beneath the surface.

12.title: Three Generations, 1 Big Makeover
12.plot: Three generations of women tackle a big renovation in Austin, TX.

13.title: Silver Lake Style Debate
13.plot: A Silver Lake, CA, couple faces a tough renovation to get their dream home.

6.title: Renovating Walls and Wardrobes
6.plot: An electrician's family opens up walls and literally moves mountains while upgrading from a small condo to a large family home with storybook charm.

7.title: Big Reno Plans, Big Problems
7.plot: An LA couple with a baby on the way closes on the perfect home, but immediately feel they've bitten off more than they can chew. From major plan changes to misplaced doors, this renovation proves to be a challenge at every turn.

1.title: Big Reno for Little Brother
1.plot: A big renovation gets even bigger when a new homeowner thinks outside the box. His older brother may have to step in to make sure he doesn't get too far over his head.

2.title: Midwest to East Coast Makeover
2.plot: After relocating to Massachusetts, a Midwestern family has limited time to find a home that fits their personalities. After they settle on a vintage home, they find that remodeling an older home comes with some costly surprises.

3.title: Budget Troubles, Reno Woes
3.plot: A musician and his wife begin an ambitious renovation on a dated family home in Silver Lake, CA. Things quickly unravel as they uncover a host of big-ticket problems.

4.title: A Mile High of Work in Denver
4.plot: A Denver couple is eager to trade their current place for a larger family home. Once they settle on a house, they dive into the top-to-bottom renovation, tackling everything from asbestos issues to structural challenges.

6.title: Learning the renovation ropes
6.plot: A MA couple upgrades from their condo into a home in Charlestown, but their renovation project requires them to deal with structural surprises, unforeseen permitting issues and a decision that may impact their open-concept design.

11.title: A nerve-racking renovation
11.plot: A Massachusetts couple looks for their perfect starter home in Swampscott. They are able to stay under budget with a fixer-upper, but quickly realize renovating a home requires making decisions they may not be ready to make.

4.title: Flipping Over Renovations
4.plot: A Massachusetts couple is juggling a new baby and a big renovation of their starter home. They flip their layout to get more space and their dream kitchen, but the project faces obstacles in the form of mold and supply delays.

9.title: Small Reno, Big Projects
9.plot: After getting the keys to a home they both love, a couple with drastically different wish lists quickly realizes they need a lot of help with renovations. They start by remodeling the kitchen, however, the renovation ripples into other rooms, causing their budget to skyrocket.

11.title: So Long Mom, Hello DIY
11.plot: A couple with construction experience test their limits when mold and structural issues arise during their first home renovation.

imdb.title: House Hunters Renovation
plot: Watch people buy homes that are fixer upper and then turn them into their dream home.
